DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , double-blind , placebo-controlled trial see acupuncture safety effectively treat fatigue Parkinson 's Disease ( PD ) . Eligible subject receive either real sham acupuncture twice weekly six week .
DOC.criteria: Patients PD Patients 4099 year age Patients significant fatigue Patients must stable medication regimen treatment PD Patients previous acupuncture within past six month Patients deep brain stimulation ( DBS ) Patients dementia , depression , sleep disorder Patients currently take medication know affect fatigue , stimulant
